name: establishes
value: establishes the connections between the Coherence Norm Axiom and other core axioms
description: The Coherence Norm Axiom resource establishes how this axiom works directly with the Prime-Coordinate Homomorphism, underpins the Canonical Representation by providing the metric for representational minimality, and sets the stage for the Coherence Inner Product, serving as a bridging element within the UOR framework
